word_mean: 上部结构：置于其它事物之上的结构
结构上方：某结构的上部或可见部分
嵌于上部的结构：同implant s.
位于工作甲板之上，由一舷伸至另一舷或距舷侧不大于0.04倍船宽的围壁结构。
。上甲板上由一舷伸至另一舷的，或其侧壁板离船侧外板向内不大于4%船宽的围蔽建筑。习惯上又指上甲板以上各种围蔽建筑物的统称。

sentence.Network_en: Democracy is part of the superstructure.
With the change of the economic foundation the entire immense superstructure is more or less rapidly transformed.
sentence.Network_cn: 随着经济基础的变化,整个庞大的上层建筑也会不同程度地发生迅速变革.

sentence.Network_en: We might try to clear up some of the cabins in the superstructure.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们可以设法清理出主甲板之上的一些船舱。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 上字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 上层〖 upperlevels;upperstrata〗 上层建筑〖 superstructure〗 上场〖 enter;appearonthestage〗.
（23）上部结构（Superstructures）； （24）快速成型数据输出（Rapid manufacturing export）；
...的意义与价值之外，在每一种进步的文化之中，还有一些上层结构（superstructures）；例如：在文学及艺术之上，有文艺批判学， …
物理专业词汇英语翻译(R-Z) ... superstring theory 超弦理论 superstructure 超点阵 supersymmetric theory 超对称理论.

list.abs: deck sundry 甲板用具deck superstructure 甲板上层建筑deck superstructure 上层建筑
...上甲板以上的各层甲板和平台，统称为上层建筑甲板(superstructure deck)。由下至上依次为01、02、03甲板等.
aft steering wheel 后操舵轮aft superstructure 尾上层建筑aft terminal 后端点
stern spring 后倒缆stern superstructure 尾部上层建筑stern sweep 舵桨

entry.tran: (船舶主甲板上方的)上层构造，上层结构
entry.def: The superstructure of a ship is the part of it that is above its main deck.

example.ex: We might try to clear up some of the cabins in the superstructure.
example.tran: 我们可以设法清理出主甲板之上的一些船舱。

means.word_mean: 1. structure consisting of the part of a ship above the main deck

auth_sentence.content: There is no filamentous superstructure of the universe held together by dark matter.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is no filamentous superstructure of the universe held together by dark matter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is no filamentous superstructure of the universe held together by dark matter.

auth_sentence.content: They were--supposedly--the first three steel superstructure buildings ever to completely collapse due to fire.
auth_sentence.res_content: They were--supposedly--the first three steel superstructure buildings ever to completely collapse due to fire.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They were--supposedly--the first three steel superstructure buildings ever to completely collapse due to fire.

auth_sentence.content: The superstructure of British power was naval might and trading wealth, but its foundation was fiscal mastery.
auth_sentence.res_content: The superstructure of British power was naval might and trading wealth, but its foundation was fiscal mastery.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The superstructure of British power was naval might and trading wealth, but its foundation was fiscal mastery.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"在……上面"; 2. 表示"超级,超过,过度"

super超级,超过,过度+annuated有年纪的→adj.老迈的,老式的
super超级,超过,过度+cili眉毛+ous……的→在眉毛上看人→目中无人
super超级,超过,过度+flu流+ous……的→超过了流出来
super超级,超过,过度+natural自然的→adj.超自然的
super超级,超过,过度+sensitive敏感的→adj.过度敏感的
super超级,超过,过度+sized大小的→adj.超大型的
super超级,超过,过度+sonic音速的→adj.超音速的

super在……上面+vis看+e→在上面看→临视
